name: Gem Miner (itch) (PeckyChicken)
description: This is a game which started off as a small project, and gradually as I worked on it it became better and better. The idea is simple. You have 3 gems to choose from, and you need to place them on the board to make 3 in a row. Then if you make 3 in a row, they get removed, along with any bricks beside them. However, if you do not make 3 in a row on any turn, more bricks will be added. The goal is to stop the board from filling up.
